TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit PrincipalOperationException extends System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalException

Docs.summary: Thrown when ADSI returns an error during an operation to update the store.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Instantiates a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The default constructor initializes a new instance of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException> class. The <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property is initialized to a system-supplied message that describes the error. This message takes into account the current system culture. The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property is initialized to `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message) cil managed

Docs.param: The text of the error message.
Docs.summary: Instantiates a new instance of the class with the specified error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException> instance is initialized with the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property set to the value of `message`. If `message` is `null`, the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property is initialized to a system-supplied message.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo info, valuetype System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context) cil managed

A that contains the source of the serialized stream that is associated with the new
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class from the specified and instances.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, class System.Exception innerException) cil managed

Docs.param: The text of the error message.
Docs.summary: Instantiates a new instance of the class with the specified error message and specified nested exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException> instance is initialized with the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property set to the value of `message` and the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property set to the value of `innerException`. If `message` is `null`, the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property is initialized to a system-supplied message. The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> is initialized to `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, int32 errorCode) cil managed

Docs.summary: Instantiates a new instance of the class with the specified error message and specified error code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException> instance is initialized with the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property set to the value of `message` and the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException.ErrorCode%2A> property set to the value of `errorCode`. If `message` is `null`, the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property is initialized to a system-supplied message.

MemberSignature.Value: public PrincipalOperationException (string message, Exception innerException, int errorCode);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, class System.Exception innerException, int32 errorCode) cil managed

Docs.summary: Instantiates a new instance of the class with the specified error message, the specified nested exception, and the specified error code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException> instance is initialized with the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property set to the value of `message` and the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property set to the value of `innerException`, and the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException.ErrorCode%2A> is set to `errorCode`. If `message` is `null`, the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property is initialized to a system-supplied message. The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> is initialized to `null`.

Docs.value:
Returns an .
The system will return 0 (zero) in the exception error code property if no underlying error was received from a win32 API. Callers need to distinguish between 0 (zero) and a valid win32 error code.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void GetObjectData (System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo info, System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context);

Docs.param: The object that holds the serialized object data.
The contextual information about the source or destination.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with serialized data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream. For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/docs/framework/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md).
